name: incision
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ C or U ] an opening that is made in something with a sharp tool, especially in someone's body during an operation: make an incision The surgeon makes a small incision into which a tube is inserted.
[ C ]
  medical
  specialized a wound or scar made by a surgical cut
